CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c, 'ABML'), IF( ISPICKVAL(Account.ABML_Contact_Type__c, 'Branch'), Account.ABML_Branch_Code__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Account.ABML_Contact_Type__c, 'Franchisee'), Account.ABML_Franchisee_Code__c, Account.Client_Code__c ) ), Account.Client_Code__c )
CustomField.label: Client Code
